alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 29 at 11:44AM MDT until June 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT /7 PM CDT/ TODAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 321, 322, 325, 326, 332, 333, 334, AND 335... .The combination of hot temperatures, low relative humidity, and gusty winds will continue to produce conditions favorable for large fire growth through this afternoon across much of southwestern and south central South Dakota. However, local fuel conditions may preclude fire growth in some locations. Scattered thunderstorms are also expected across the area this afternoon. These storms may produce strong, erratic wind gusts and lightning with little to no associated rainfall. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 321, 322, 325, 326, AND 332... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 321 Southern Black Hills, 322 Fall River County Area, 325 Custer County Plains, 326 Pine Ridge Area and 332 Badlands Area. * WINDS...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * LIGHTNING...Cloud to ground lighting with little to no rainfall is possible. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity, and dry lightning would produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area; Southern Black Hills
